column1: The family will receive friends at Ponders Melrose Chapel from 5:00 p.m. until 9:00 p.m. Sunday and after 9:00 a.m. Monday.  Services to celebrate the life of Mr. George Lewis Pierce Sr. will be held Monday
column3: 2015 at 3:00 p.m. at the Ponders Melrose Chapel with Reverend George Ross and Reverend Matt Futch officiating. Interment will follow in the Whitfield Memorial Gardens with American Legion Post 112 in charge of military rites. His grandsons will serve as pallbearers.
